About Me

A few little things about me ...

BIO

Information Technology Professional and Military Veteran with over 10 years of experience and a proven ability to be a corporate steward interacting and collaborating with multiple levels of management and diverse cultural audiences. Focused on maintaining high levels of accuracy and efficiency, as well as achieving project implementation and IT infrastructure goals. Acclimated to risk, responsibility, and operating under pervasive pressure while consistently excelling. Adept at quickly mastering new concepts and has a desire to master the latest technology. Career supported by operational experience, certifications, and an Associate of Science degree.

Consultant

Jan. - May & Sep. - Dec.2020

• Diagnosed systems outages to determine appropriate corrective actions. • Implemented preventative maintenance and repairs of equipment as appropriate. • Coordinated support for systems issues not locally correctable. • Required limited supervision with occasional coaching and clearly established policies. • Performed onsite systems installation and integration management as needed. • Acted as a training resource for Microsoft Office, Gmail, WMS, and related applications. • Applied and adheres to appropriate technical security policies to ensure that the DC environment is secure. • Carried out PC support/repair experience (Network Essentials experience). • Provided understanding of Local and Wide Area network architectures and capabilities, including understanding of Citrix / Thin client architectures. .
